title: Senior Data/ML Associate Committee
description: Actively involved as a Senior Data/ML Associate in supporting various workshops and study jam lessons with machine learning topics under the Data/ML Team.
Facilitating sessions on Machine Learning Fundamentals through python and colab while engaging with the network of GDG Teams.
Former SME in the software development team, mentored new developers that facilitated their growth.

title: Frontend Freelance Developer
description: Implementing web designs of core pages and components, including authentication (login/sign-up), settings, and main home pages, through Figma, React, and Tailwind while improving UX by analyzing user/client feedback.
Collaborated with a team of three developers to create a graduate school alumni portal website from scratch.

title: Chief Technology Officer & Co-founder
description: Co-founded and led HinyApp, a mental health and wellness startup, and helped shape core support tools and resources to better serve students' well-being and engagement.
Pitched at the DICT 2022 Regional Pitching Competition in Palawan and gaining mentorship from the Palawan International Technology Business Incubator.
Designed the apps UI in Figma, developed the prototype, and worked with the university's ICT office to refine features and ensure seamless integration.
